name: Candy Land
prompt: A VibeDeck controller made entirely of candy and sweets. The body is chocolate with a bite taken out of one corner. Buttons are colorful gummy bears, jelly beans, and M&Ms. The rotary knob is a swirled lollipop. Frosting piped around the edges. Sprinkles scattered on top. The LCD screen is a candy wrapper. Cotton candy clouds around it. Sweet, playful, delicious looking. Bright candy shop lighting.
